function EP03_12()
    --.承-2【8月第1週】「分裂」
    SaveData.Title = "分裂"

    --//BG：1-A教室（昼）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG014aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM02.wav")

    MSG([[ One week has passed since summer vacation began. The script has been completed, and the casting has been decided smoothly. ]])

    MSG([[ Finally, we reached the stage where we split into two groups: the actors and the backstage crew, and started working. ]])
    --//BU：オウガ（通常）、ヒユ（驚き）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_HIY01ca")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ Ouga-kun from the boys' division is also scheduled to join the actors' group. Today, I—Erika—was to introduce him and join the practice with 1-A. ]])

    MSG([[ But everyone in 1-A was tense about Ouga-kun’s arrival. Even though we had talked it over beforehand, it was natural that the appearance of a disliked boy from the boys' division would cause a stir. ]])

    MSG([[ I wondered if Ouga-kun would antagonize them again— but surprisingly, he bowed deeply and spoke in a gentlemanly tone. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0173.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】通常
 "I’m Ouga Rokujou, playing the beast role. I regret intruding on your girls’ practice, but I hope you’ll take care of me." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0174.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】通常
 "I’m not familiar with the rules of the girls’ division, so I might cause some trouble. Please don’t hesitate to point it out. I will do my best to improve." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0175.wav")

    MSG([[
    【Ouga】笑顔
 "Let’s create the best stage together." ]])
    --//SE：拍手
PLAY_SE("SEa021.wav")
WAIT(300)

    MSG([[ The class responded to Ouga-kun’s greeting with warm applause. ]])

    MSG([[ I quietly approached Ouga-kun and whispered in his ear. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0559.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】通常
 "W-Why? You seem different than usual." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0176.wav")

    MSG([[
    【Ouga】通常
 "How rude. My muscles are fine today, you know? Look at the bulging biceps on these mighty forearms." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fc")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0560.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】苦笑
 "N-No, I just meant you didn’t laugh loudly or call us 'females' today." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0177.wav")

    MSG([[
    【Ouga】笑顔
 "If I acted like that, everyone in the girls’ division would be scared." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0178.wav")

    MSG([[
    【Ouga】通常
 "My fate was intertwined with yours, Erika. I can’t cause unnecessary trouble with the girls’ division anymore." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0179.wav")

    MSG([[
    【Ouga】笑顔
 "Both you, Erika, and Minato pushed yourselves to save me, right? I can push myself a little too." ]])

    MSG([[ Looking closely, his calm smile looked a bit strained. His mouth twitched as if he was about to burst out laughing loudly, as usual. ]])

    MSG([[ Ouga-kun was doing his best to avoid intimidating the girls. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_HIY01da")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0211.wav")

    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】悲しみ
 "We actors are probably fine... but what about the backstage crew? I heard that the three seniors who caused the sexual harassment incident before are in charge there." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0561.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】笑顔
 "It’s okay. From what Minato’s told me, those seniors seem to have completely reformed. They shouldn’t make the same mistakes again." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0562.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】通常
 "Besides, Daria and her knights are supporting the backstage crew. If any trouble arises, they should be able to stop it." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Since Daria and her group are also performing at the Shirahisai Festival, we will be working together in the gym on stage props and costumes. ]])

    MSG([[ Daria’s 'knights' apparently include many from the drama club, so if we get stuck on production, they’ll help out. That’s a great relief. I think the backstage crew can proceed with a perfect setup. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_HIY01ga")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0212.wav")

    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】焦り
 "I-I hope so... A-Also! Is it really true that Uran and you will be competing in the Princess Election? Why?" ]])

    MSG([[ Hiyu asked cautiously. Looking around at the classmates, I noticed several with worried expressions like hers. ]])

    MSG([[ They must have already heard rumors about the Princess Election. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fc")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0563.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】苦笑
 "Please don’t worry. We’re just following tradition to let the Princess Election decide whether to allow a joint performance with the boys’ division." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0564.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】通常
 "If I lose, neither Ouga-kun nor I will participate in the play. So just in case, we should prepare an understudy." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_HIY01da")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0213.wav")

    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】悲しみ
 "No way! Why would you put yourself at risk for the boys’ division, even you, Sister..." ]])

    MSG([[ After she said this, Hiyu suddenly looked at Ouga-kun sharply. ]])

    MSG([[ Ouga-kun smiled faintly. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0180.wav")

    MSG([[
    【Ouga】笑顔
 "No need to worry. I was the one who dragged Erika into this. You have every right to blame me." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0181.wav")

    MSG([[
    【Ouga】通常
 "But I have no intention of backing down. Erika and I will face this battle believing firmly that we are in the right and will win." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0214.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】悲しみ
 "I-I believe Sister Erika will win too!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0182.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】通常
 "Then, for now, we just have to practice." ]])

    MSG([[ Ouga-kun took out a script full of sticky notes from his pocket and placed it on the desk. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0183.wav")

    MSG([[
    【Ouga】笑顔
 "With this team, I believe we can put on the best stage presentation in Yuriai Private Academy’s history. Let’s believe in Erika’s victory and focus on practice." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0184.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】笑顔
 "Let’s create a new history for this academy together!" ]])

    MSG([[ Ouga-kun’s words eased the fear from everyone’s faces. ]])

    MSG([[ Maybe everyone began to believe in my victory. From now on, with the election, Shirahisai preparations, and crossdressing training, I might be overwhelmed, but I’ll do my best. ]])

    MSG([[ For the smiles of everyone in 1-A. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0565.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】驚き
 "Huh...? If I recall, there were supposed to be sixteen actors..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ That’s when I noticed something. ]])

    MSG([[ One actor was missing. Comparing the printed roster with everyone’s faces, I noticed the name of the missing person, and a bad feeling rose in my chest. ]])

    MSG([[ The absent one was Yururuin Yuri-san. She was a student who looked like she wanted to say something during the recent decision on the performance. ]])
    --　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("EP03_13")
end
